description: Variation of condition 1 (approved drawings) and 5 (window details) of planning permission dated 29th February 2024 (RN 23/06144/FULL) for the use of building as 4n self-contained residential units (Use Class C3) with associated demolition and replacement of extensions within central courtyard and at roof level; Creation of third floor external terrace; Alterations/replacement of windows; Replacement of rear boundary wall with dwarf wall and metal railings; Installation of air-source heat pumps; and associated works. NAMELY, Amendments to main roof level, including installation of two new rooflights/smoke vents; Mews house roof, including installation of a rooflight with roof access hatch, and installation of area of concrete paving slabs; Palace Court elevation & lightwell, including installation of dry riser inlet, four air bricks, new stair and acoustic louvres, and lowering of lightwell floor; Ossington Street elevation & lightwell, including covering lower ground floor level in render, installation of four air bricks and works to downpipes; and central lightwell section/elevations, including the relocation of ASHP from the front lightwell, replacement of red brick on rear of mews with white painted render, replacement of 4 no. sash windows wat ground and first floor, and lowering of window cill to create fire door on south elevation.
